Topic.Title: Is code necessary for a good game?

Posts.EditableText: So, I made a game a few years back without code (Lands of unknown when I went under the name Jaret... Though I advise against playing this one...). I've been browsing these forums and noticed that a lot of people are using code. My question is, do you think that a good game can be made without coding, as in just using the basic settings?
